title: Quest for country (A)
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Country life - Psychological aspects
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Country life - Australia
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Country life - Psychological aspects
description: Episode number 1 of Series "From spirit to spirit (A)". This program expresses the spiritual and physical catharsis of an Aboriginal man from the urban environment. Michael Riley gives an insight into the indigenous view of white society and highlights the problems which non-Aboriginal people may have in understanding this attitude as well as the difficulties Aboriginal people may have in explaining it.
related_objects: Series; S01250; From spirit to spirit (A); Active; 1993
